messages.content:
[
  {
    "screen_number": 1,
    "voiceover_text": "Are your teams losing productivity due to fragmented workflows and disconnected tools?",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "overlapping app windows, frustrated business professionals, missed deadline alerts",
    "action_notes": "Dynamic animation of multiple apps and stressed team members"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 2,
    "voiceover_text": "Introducing FlowSync—the all-in-one platform built for seamless project management and collaboration.",
    "target_duration_sec": 7,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "FlowSync logo animation, modern UI, brand colors",
    "action_notes": "Logo reveal transitions into product interface"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 3,
    "voiceover_text": "With FlowSync’s unified dashboard, manage every project from a single, intuitive workspace.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "dashboard overview, project cards, navigation bar",
    "action_notes": "Screen recording of dashboard navigation, highlighting project overview"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 4,
    "voiceover_text": "Collaborate in real time with built-in team chat and effortless file sharing.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "team chat window, file upload, sharing files",
    "action_notes": "Cursor demonstrates sending a message and uploading a file"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 5,
    "voiceover_text": "Assign tasks instantly and keep everyone aligned, no matter where they work.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "task assignment UI, remote team avatars, notifications",
    "action_notes": "User assigns a task, team members receive notifications"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 6,
    "voiceover_text": "Monitor progress with AI-powered analytics that highlight bottlenecks and track milestones.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "AI analytics dashboard, progress graphs, milestone icons",
    "action_notes": "Animated charts and graphs updating in real time"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 7,
    "voiceover_text": "Integrate FlowSync with Slack, Google Drive, Trello, Outlook, and more—no more switching between apps.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "slides/text overlay",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "integration logos, connecting lines to FlowSync interface",
    "action_notes": "Icons animate in and connect to FlowSync"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 8,
    "voiceover_text": "Customize notifications and automate workflows to keep your team proactive and on track.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "notification settings, workflow automation builder",
    "action_notes": "User sets up a custom notification and creates an automation rule"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 9,
    "voiceover_text": "Perfect for remote and cross-functional teams managing complex projects from anywhere.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "stock video",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "diverse remote teams on video calls, collaborative workspaces",
    "action_notes": "Footage of professionals collaborating remotely, sharing screens"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 10,
    "voiceover_text": "Getting started is simple: Log in, create a project, and invite your team in seconds.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "login screen, new project creation, invite dialog",
    "action_notes": "Step-by-step UI walkthrough of onboarding process"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 11,
    "voiceover_text": "Collaborate, assign tasks, and monitor progress—all in one place with FlowSync.",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "screencast",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "real-time chat, file sharing, task assignment, analytics dashboard",
    "action_notes": "Live demo of team members interacting in the platform"
  },
  {
    "screen_number": 12,
    "voiceover_text": "Ready to boost your team’s productivity? Visit flowsync.com to start your free trial today!",
    "target_duration_sec": 6,
    "screen_type": "cta",
    "on_screen_visual_keywords": "website URL, free trial button, FlowSync branding",
    "action_notes": "Animated CTA overlay with website and free trial button"
  }
]
